name: Linux Mint Forums (WIP)
description: Work in progress remodel of the Linux Mint forums.
additional_info:
This is work in progress. So far have done:

Main Site: Header modernised and colour scheme changed to match Mint blog site

Board Index: Gradients removed, larger fonts, increased padding, changed board/topic icons. Hovers and other rollovers are now green as opposed to yellow/blue

Thread pages: Curves and gradients removed, text larger. Hovers all now green as opposed to yellow/blue

Reply Page: tidied up colours, larger flatter buttons, no gradients or corners


To do:

All other pages, user control panel, memberlists etc. Polls, and other features.
